definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War period, the County is the coexistence of two regimes.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭時期，縣境基本上是兩種政權並存。

sentences.english: KMT-CCP cooperation ensured the War against Japan .
sentences.chinese: 國共合作是抗日戰爭勝利的根本保證。

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War early, Linfen in Shanxi Province for seven administrative districts in the 6th District.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭初期，臨汾爲山西省7個行政區中的第6區。

sentences.english: Huang Gang is the rising reporter star during the War of Resistance against Japan.
sentences.chinese: 黃鋼是中國抗日戰爭中升起的一顆記者新星。

sentences.english: It happened during the Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 事情發生在抗日戰爭的時候。

sentences.english: The Chinese Anti-Japanese war began the earliest and lasted the longest, and was the determinant in defeating Japanese Fascists.
sentences.chinese: 中國抗日戰爭是世界反法西斯戰爭的東方主戰場。

sentences.english: The anti-Japanese war is essentially a peasant war.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭，實質上就是農民戰爭。

sentences.english: This produced negative infection to the Anti-Japanese War afterward.
sentences.chinese: 對後來的抗日戰爭也產生了消極的影響。

sentences.english: Educational cause was one of the important battlefronts in the period of anti-Japanese war.
sentences.chinese: 教育事業是抗日戰爭時期對敵鬥爭的一條重要戰線。

sentences.english: It is where Fighting Japaness War brouk out.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是抗日戰爭暴發的地方。

sentences.english: In 1937 the Chinese people threw themselves into an all-out war of resistance against Japanese aggression.
sentences.chinese: 一九三七年，中國人民開始了全民族的抗日戰爭。

sentences.english: During the period of the War of Resistance Against Japan, he refused to act for the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 在抗日戰爭時期，他曾拒絕爲日本侵略者演戲。

sentences.english: Last night I saw a very good film, which was about the Anti-Japanses War.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我看了一部很好的電影，它是關於抗日戰爭的。

sentences.english: During the Anti-Japanese War, the Soviet Union was on the side of China.
sentences.chinese: 在抗日戰爭中，蘇聯站在中國一邊。

sentences.english: During the Sino-Japanese war, Chee Kwon spent 9 months in Yan'an.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭期間，陳志昆在延安生活了9個月。

sentences.english: My father became an army officer during the Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 我父親在抗日戰爭時是個軍官。

definition: war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)
War of Liberation (1945-49), after which the Communists 共產黨武裝|共产党武装 under Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 took over from the Nationalists 國民政府|国民政府 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
Chinese Nationalist Party 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] and Chinese Communist Party 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Chiang Kai-shek (1887-1975), military leader, head of the Nationalist government in China 1928-1949 and the government in exile on Taiwan 1950-1975
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
to found a country/nation-building/the foundation of PRC by Mao Zedong in 1949
